climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: This Certified Refurbished product is factory refurbished, shows limited or no wear, and includes all original accessories plus a 90-day warranty
Reduces noise, wind and echo from calls and delivers HD audio clarity when used with wideband-enabled smartphones and mobile service
DeepSleep hibernation mode activates when out of range from your paired phone, keeping the headset charged up to six months
Control your music and streaming audio using headset buttons instead of your smartphone
Onscreen headset battery meter is automatic for iPhone and is enabled for Android smartphones using the free Plantronics battery widget for Find MyHeadset app
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great - compares in clarity to the M55 and the Samsung 1700.
reviews.reviewText: I love using a bluetooth when I am talking on the phone, have owned approx. 5 over the last couple of years, including a Jabra, a couple of Samsung 1700s, the Mpow Knight Pro 4.0 and most recently the Plantronics M55. I've been using the M70 (certified refurbished) - for just over 2 months now and am very happy with it.Clarity is the top priority for me and the Plantronics M70 delivers. I can hear very well both in the house and when driving, without having it on full volume. It holds a charge for several days, even though I use it throughout the day, every day. When you power it on it conveniently lets you know exactly how much charge time is left. it's small in size and it has built-in software to help you find the bluetooth if (when) you misplace it. The audible beep it sets off is not very loud (would recommend that Plantronics changes this), but it is loud enough to enable me to find it if I am close by. The only other suggestion for improvement would be if it came with a couple of ear gels in other sizes as the only one that came with it is a bit large for my ear. I can still wear it comfortably for the most part, and even have occasions where I forget that I am wearing it. That being said, if I leave it in for an hour plus, I eventually want a break from it. My favorite bluetooth before this was the Samsung 1700. I think the quality between the two is close to the same, but this one was 1/2 the price so I decided to give it a try. I'm glad that I did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another great Plantronics headset
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the Plantronics M55 for over 5 years, and I accidentally stepped on it a while back. Amazingly it still works, but it's never quite been the same since.Since M55's are getting very hard to find, I started looking and finally found the M70. I think it's also no longer being made, which baffles me. Both the M55 and the M70 are worlds better than anything Plantronics is making today. They are just as small and light, but have 50% more battery life. Both of these have an honest-to-goodness 11 hour battery life. All the current ones are more like 7 hrs.Both are extremely comfortable, very durable, great sound quality, and awesome battery life. They're just amazing.The one area where the M70 really excels is the volume switch. The M55 had a single volume button. M70 has a proper up and down volume rocker.However I do have to say that the M55 had slightly better looks. I mean the M70 isn't bad, but it's black matte plastic with a white plastic accent running around the edge. The M55 has a metal frame with black plastic panels (some glossy, some matte).I also suspect the M55's metal frame makes it more durable. I hope I never step on my M70, but I wouldn't expect its plastic construction to survive as well. But the M70 does feel quite solid, and I'm sure it will handle any normal wear and tear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bought 2, neither one worked, high pitched squeal in both, I would recommend not purchasing.
reviews.reviewText: I have had one of these for years and it works great. I bought mine new years ago. I am still using it. Both of the ones I am returning were supposedly refurbished, they both had a high pitched constant squeal for both the sender and receiver of the call. I would not recommend buying this refurbished product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, great value at the price point.
reviews.reviewText: Great talk time (up to 11 hours) for all day usage. Each time you power it on it says how many hours of talk time are left, which is a convenient way to check your battery level. I also like that when synced to my Note 5 it will also stream music and other audio, which is useful when I don't have a pair of headphones while in a public place. Easy to use and sync, and the standard micro USB slot makes it easy to charge with any charger. Call quality is ok. Could be better, but at this price point I'd say it's solid -- it's not difficult to understand people or anything.Good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2015
reviews.reviewText: I had Playtronics bluetooth headset before, and I should say this one is not very comfortable. The plastic piece that goes into the ear is hard, and creates significant discomfort. The earpiece is designed in a way, that it can only be placed on the right ear, and you have to use both hands to put it on. I had no issues with cell phone paring or sound quality, but I would not recommend this particular model.Update: given long lasting battery is simple design I updated my rating to four stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Longlasting 11 hour battery charge!!
reviews.reviewText: This is my 4th or 5th M70!! So obviously I highly recommend it. I didn’t buy so many because they stopped working. After many years of use, I caught one in a drawer & the cover came off. But I still kept using it until I decided it wasn’t a good idea in case I get a shock—faithful user! I This model is quite affordable but they use to be about $130 back in the day.I originally bought this model because of the 11 hrs battery and the 30-50 ft from my phone. Great bargain, great Bluetooth model. I use 1 at home, 1 in my purse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It worked great for first few months after which I started noticing ...
reviews.reviewText: It worked great for first few months after which I started noticing the battery life declined and it started disconnecting frequently. Now it just lies in my official bag and I dont use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I buy these once a year. They’re my favorite! I buy them for everyone
